    {payload: { begin: begin}, path : "Dehumidifier4/temperature"},

name: Custom Chart3
format:
<template>
    <canvas id="humidityChart"></canvas>
</template>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js"></script>
<script>
    export default {
        mounted() {
            this.$socket.on('msg-input:' + this.id, this.onInput);
            this.chart = this.createChart();
        },
        methods: {
            onInput(msg) {
                // Si un champ duration est pr√©sent, mettre √† jour la dur√©e
                if (msg.duration) {
                    this.duration = msg.duration;  // Met √† jour la dur√©e
                    this.updateChart();  // Met √† jour le graphique avec la nouvelle dur√©e
                }

                // Si un payload est pr√©sent, mettre √† jour le graphique
                if (msg.payload) {
                    this.updateChart(msg.payload);  // Met √† jour le graphique avec les nouvelles donn√©es
                }
            },
            createChart() {
                const ctx = document.getElementById('humidityChart').getContext('2d');
                return new Chart(ctx, {
                    type: 'line',
                    data: {
                        labels: [],
                        datasets: []
                    },
                    options: {
                        responsive: true,
                        scales: {
                            x: {
                                type: 'time',
                                time: {
                                    unit: 'minute',
                                    tooltipFormat: 'll HH:mm'
                                },
                                title: {
                                    display: true,
                                    text: 'Time'
                                }
                            },
                            y: {
                                beginAtZero: true,
                                title: {
                                    display: true,
                                    text: 'Value'
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                });
            },
            updateChart(data) {
                if (data) {
                    data.forEach(item => {
                        const series = item.series;
                        const date = new Date(item.x);
                        const existingDataset = this.chart.data.datasets.find(dataset => dataset.label === series);

                        if (existingDataset) {
                            existingDataset.data.push({ x: date, y: item.y });
                        } else {
                            this.chart.data.datasets.push({
                                label: series,
                                data: [{ x: date, y: item.y }],
                                //borderColor: this.getRandomColor(),
                                fill: false
                            });
                        }
                    });
                }

                // Si une dur√©e est d√©finie, ajuster la plage de l'axe X
                if (this.duration) {
                    const now = new Date();
                    const durationLimit = new Date(now - this.duration * 1000);

                    // Supprimer les donn√©es plus anciennes que la dur√©e
                    this.chart.data.datasets.forEach(dataset => {
                        dataset.data = dataset.data.filter(item => item.x >= durationLimit);
                    });

                    // R√©actualiser l'axe des X
                    this.chart.update();
                }
            },
            getRandomColor() {
                const letters = '0123456789ABCDEF';
                let color = '#';
                for (let i = 0; i < 6; i++) {
                    color += letters[Math.floor(Math.random() * 16)];
                }
                return color;
            }
        }
    };
</script>

name: script
Chart4
format:
<template>
    <canvas ref="chart4" />
</template>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js"></script>

<script>
    export default {
        mounted() {
            this.$socket.on('msg-input:' + this.id, this.onInput)

            // code here when the component is first loaded
            let interval = setInterval(() => {
                if (window.Chart) {
                    // Babylon.js is loaded, so we can now use it
                    clearInterval(interval);
                    this.draw()
                }
            }, 100);
        },
        methods: {
            draw () {
                const ctx = this.$refs.chart4
                const datasets = []
                
                // Render the chart
                const chart = new Chart(ctx, {
                    type: 'line',
                    data: {
                        datasets: [{
                            label: "My Label 2",
                            data: []
                        }]
                    },
                    options: {
                        animation: true,
                        responsive: true,
                        scales: {
                            x: {
                                type: 'time'
                            }
                        },
                        parsing: {
                            xAxisKey: 'time',
                            yAxisKey: 'value'
                        },
                        plugins: {
                            legend: {
                                position: 'top',
                            },
                            title: {
                                display: true,
                                text: 'Chart4'
                            }
                        }   
                    },
                });
                // make this available to all elements of the component
                this.chart = chart
            },
            onInput (msg) {
                this.chart.data.datasets[0].data.push({
                    time: (new Date()).getTime(),
                    value: msg.payload
                }) 
                this.chart.update()      
            }
        }
    }
</script>

If minimum time is sent to chart, it will be absolute
Chart does not take it as time frame
So if change is in minutes, it is reasonable enough
to send new min value to chart in every minute
